content.rendered:
Makes 24 Pastry Rolls

Ingredients

Ingredients
8 Fry’s Original Hot Dogs
12 tbsp oil
1 large onion, finely chopped
1 cup vegan cheese, grated
2 green chilies, finely chopped
1 250g ready-made pastry
1 tbsp plant milk
Handful of sesame seeds

Directions

Cut the Hot Dogs into quarters. Heat oil, add in Hot Dogs and onions. Sauté for 2 minutes. Remove and cool. Roll out pastry to fit your Hot Dog.

Place your Hot Dog in the centre of the pastry together with onion, cheese and chilli. Seal the ends with water, brush with milk and sprinkle sesame seeds on top of pastry. Bake for 15-20 minutes on 180°C degrees or until golden brown.
